posts.description: Blunder Boys: They're Great Political Consultants, But Their Candidates Keep Losing | Washington City Paper
posts.extended: During one interview with LL, Calomiris revealed that he didn’t even know how many years a Council term lasts. Josh Brown—Calomiris’ youthful political consultant who has already served in prominent positions on several other local campaigns—cut in.

posts.description: NYPD sent undercover officers to Black Lives Matter protest, records reveal | US news | The Guardian
posts.extended: The New York police department also collected ‘multimedia records’ of protests after the death of Eric Garner, legal papers show 07.00 EDT Last modified on Thursday 29 September 2016 10.

Recently, I was tinkering with ways of creating the illusion of depth for mapping water. The gist is that you can use increasing opacity in deeper areas to get the effect of diffused light and reduced visibility. Like in real life.
